About Me

Hi, I'm Sebastian, a blockchain and distributed ledger technology specialist currently pursuing my PhD at the University of Technology Sydney (UTS), funded by the Digital Finance Cooperative Research Centre (DFCRC).

I hold a Masterâ€™s in Blockchain & DLT from the University of Applied Sciences Mittweida and a Bachelor's in Economics from the Free University of Berlin

Previously, I gained valuable experience at the German Parliament, the Blockchain Competence Center Mittweida, and Deloitte

I am passionate about the transformational potential of blockchain technology. My aim is to leverage my technical skills and economics background to drive innovation in this rapidly evolving space.

Experience

Deloitte Blockchain Institute

Consultant Internship

April 2022 - September 2022

www2.deloitte.com

Worked alongside the business and the tech team

Navigating the dynamic world of blockchain, I embarked on a journey at Deloitte. My role as a Technical Consultant had me diving deep into blockchain spaces, presenting insights to diverse audiences. I delved into Hyperledger Aries and ACA-Py, coding in JavaScript and TypeScript. My scope ranged from CBDC to DeFi and I presented my findings on stablecoins and the TerraLuna crash.

Blockchain Competence Center Mittweida (BCCM)

Researcher

June 2021 - August 2021

blockchain.hs-mittweida.de

Study on tokenization and the potential economic impact of Web3

At BCCM, my strides took me towards a fascinating study on tokenization and Web3. Supported by the Economic Council and the German Parliament, I spearheaded research, interviewing industry giants like BCG, IBM, ITSA and more.

Blockchain Competence Center Mittweida (BCCM)

Researcher L2 Technologies

December 2020 - February 2021

blockchain.hs-mittweida.de

Research on Layer 2 Technologies with a focus on Ethereum Ecosystem

Research on Layer 2 Solutions in the Distributed Ledger Space. Focused on Ethereum and Bitcoin. Lightning, Rollups,State channels. Created the most comprehensive list of Layer 2 Projects in 2021.

German Parliament (Deutscher Bundestag)

Digital Policy Analyst

May 2019 - August 2019

bundestag.de

Pushing digitization

Focused on Distributed Ledger Technologies, Artificial Intelligence, Platform Economics, Belt and Road Initiative. Book published: Neustaat- Politik und Staat mussen sich aendern. Pitched ideas in front of members of parliament.

Education

University of Applied Sciences Mittweida

M.Sc. Blockchain & Distributed Ledger Technologies

2020 - 2023

The program in Blockchain & Distributed Ledger Technology is the first two year program world wide focusing on Distributed Ledger Technologies.

The program focuses on the Bitcoin and Ethereum blockchain. The curriculum offers comprehensive insights into these transformative technologies. An in depth understanding of Ethereum is given with an introduction to Solidity. To deepen my Computer Science knowledge, I spent a semester abroad at James Cook University in Singapore. Beyond technology, the program nurtured an innovative spirit, equipping graduates like myself with entrepreneurial skills for real-world impact.

Free University of Berlin,

B.Sc. Economics

2015 - 2019

Founded in 1948, the Free University of Berlin (Freie UniversitÃ¤t Berlin) stands as a renowned institution in Germany.

With a strong commitment to academic excellence and interdisciplinary learning, the university offers a dynamic environment for students pursuing various fields of study. The B.Sc. in Economics program at the Free University of Berlin is designed to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of economic principles, theories, and applications. Renowned for its rigorous curriculum and diverse faculty, the university equips graduates with the analytical skills and knowledge. During my studies I spent one semester in Athens, Greece at the Athens University of Economics and Business and one semester in Kuala Lumpur at Monash University Malaysia.
